value.unicode:
<tal:block 
 tal:define="mode python: options.get('mode', 'erp5_front');
 default_pad_group python: options.get('default_pad_group', '');
 kw python: dict(mode=mode, default_pad_group=default_pad_group);
 knowledge_pads python: here.ERP5Site_getKnowledgePadListForUser(**kw);
 struct python: here.ERP5Site_getActiveKnowledgePadForUser(knowledge_pads, **kw);
 global active_knowledge_pad python: struct[0];
 knowledge_pads python: struct[1];
 columns python: options.get('columns', 3);
 hasUserActivity python: here.ERP5Site_hasUserActivity(active_knowledge_pad, **kw);
 isAnon python: here.portal_membership.isAnonymousUser();
 createDefaultPadForUser python: len(knowledge_pads)==0 and not hasUserActivity;
 waitForActivitiesOnServer python: active_knowledge_pad is None and hasUserActivity;
 isUserAllowedToCreateKnowledgePads context/Base_isUserAllowedToUseKnowledgePad;
 isKnowledgePadTemplateUsed python: request.get('is_knowledge_pad_template_used', 0);
 isAnonymousKnowledgePadUsed python: request.get('use_anonymous_knowledge_pad', False);
 cancel_url here/absolute_url;">
 
 <span metal:use-macro="container/Base_viewKnowledgePadMacroLibrary/macros/navigation"/>
 
 </tal:block>
